summary: Lego is a popular toy brand from Denmark, known for its colorful plastic bricks that lock together. These bricks can be used to build all sorts of creations, from cars to castles! The Lego Group started making these toys in 1949, and now they're one of the biggest toy companies worldwide. They produce around 36 billion bricks each year, and people of all ages love playing with them. Lego also has theme parks, movies, and games, making it a huge part of many children's (and adults') playtime.
title: Lego
